name: Dollar Dungeon: The first one is free
name_original: Dollar Dungeon: The first one is free
description:
A simple, 3-level pyramid dungeon. you'll find some mighty treasures, then fight the boss. ...Then again, why not go straight for the boss instead?

Available for Windows only.

Version 1.1 now available. Music has been added to the Dungeon. Now you can listen to an eerie tune as you fight and explore.

Please comment below. Tell me your experience with this game, and how future games might be improved.

Follow us on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Dollardungeons.

Vote for Dollar Dungeon: the first one is free on Steam Greenlight.
